name: Victorian Fear - (Download)
description:
VICTORIAN FEAR - THE FIRST CHAPTER

You will have to help our hero to find his brother! What kind of horror and madness is behind this strange disappearance?

- Experiment a gameplay like classic videogames.
- Retrogaming? Retroengine (Rpgmaker2k3 to the limits)
- A horror story, serial killer, a gas lamp!
- Hide and seek.
- It´s truly inspired in games like Maniac Mansion, Clocktower and The Last Door.
- Support us! The second chapter is in developing, right now!

CONTROLS

  • CONTROLLER/JOYSTICK SUPPORTED.
  • HERO:
    • Arrow keys - Move
    • Z - Select/ Interact
    • X - Menu
  • LOAD/SAVE/QUITGAME:
    • QUITGAME- Press X and then move to QUITGAME
    • LOAD GAME - Press X in "----------" at TITLESCREEN
    • SAVE GAME - Press X in RED PAINTINGS during the game
  • FOR MORE INFO LOOK HOW TO PLAY IN GAMESCREEN.

FOLLOW ME @VictorianFear FOR UPDATES AND INFO ABOUT NEXT CHAPTERS! IF YOU REALLY ENJOY THE GAME, YOU CAN DONATE US TO HELP FINISH THE NEXT CHAPTERS! THANK YOU!
